aircraft.value: Shadow Hunter - AC-1528-191 at Zone-1 Facility

defect_observed.value: Hydraulic line vibration induced fatigue. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Actuator System component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

preventive_action.value: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 31/07/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 01/08/2024 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 01/08/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 03/08/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 09/08/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Hydraulic line vibration induced fatigue. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Actuator System component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation
d) Attributable Code: D - Due to features inherent in the design
